name: Blockz Online !
description:
Welcome to the world of Blockz Online ! A simple 2D online game i made in unity for me and my friends to try out. It might come more updates but for now, just remeber this is not a good game.

Changelog :

V 1.0 : You can walk jump and shoot , join / create rooms. Max people in one room = 4, max people online at the same time = 20. 

Yet to come : 

A somehow working chat system 

Faster shots or fixing shooting system somehow.

Teams, ( Red vs Blue etc )

Skins ( starting with different colors and in the future maybe custom shots color and accessories )
